    <h1 class="heading-7">
     Asian Suits
    </h1>
    <div class="cblock">
     <a href="http://www.traditionsonline.co.uk/I/13/designer-asian-suits.aspx" id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_store_href">
      <img alt="http://www.traditionsonline.co.uk/images/12AsianSuits-Store.jpg" id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_storeimg" src="http://www.traditionsonline.co.uk/images/12AsianSuits-Store.jpg"/>
     </a>
     <a href="http://www.traditionsonline.co.uk/c/13/asian-suits.aspx" id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_online_href">
      <img alt="http://www.traditionsonline.co.uk/images/13AsianSuits-Online.jpg" id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_onlineimg" src="http://www.traditionsonline.co.uk/images/13AsianSuits-Online.jpg"/>
     </a>
    </div>
    <div id="scrollbar1">
     <div class="scrollbar">
      <div class="track">
       <div class="thumb">
        <div class="end">
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="viewport">
      <div class="overview">
       <strong style="font-size: 20px;">
        Asian Suits
       </strong>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        We dont just cater for Asian brides and Asian bridalwear, our premium collection of Asian womenswear includes all types of Indian dresses including anarkalis, shalawar kameez and Indian suits, available in our London stores and online. With our reputation for stocking the latest fashions and trends, we like to spoil our shoppers with a choice that goes beyond their expectations. Youll discover an impressive range of suits in the styles you prefer, whether youre after a classic shalawar kameez, a traditional churidar, modern shorter dresses or long Pakistani style anarkalis, we offer endless options for the cut, shape and style of your dress, trousers and accompanying shawls.
       </p>
       <p>
        As youll see throughout our collections, personal choice is always catered for and because we understand that very woman is different, we make a conscious effort to offer the widest choice possible. From long sleeves to sleeveless, short lengths to floor length, crystals to classic, an infinite selection of fabrics (silks, georgettes, lace, brocade and nets) and an immense palette of colours, with unique surface decoration that can be as dressy or as delicate as you like, brides and guests alike will be overwhelmed by our ranges both in store and online.
        <br/>
       </p>
       <p>
        In-store
        <br/>
        Fans of Pakistani womenswear will enjoy browsing our range of pretty shalawar kameez, churidar and trouser suits, a-line bottoms, knee lengths or long length anarkalis, all which can be adjusted to suit your tastes, whether you prefer your Asian fashion fitted or loose. And its not just the cut that can be personalised.
       </p>
       <p>
        We offer infinite colour choices and a full range of designer womenswear made from superior fabrics that are both comfortable and beautiful. Browse suits made from a variety of materials such as chiffon, lace, brocades, net and georgettes which are embellished with embroidery, stonework, decorative cutwork and in cuts that compliment your figure.
       </p>
       <p>
        Depending on the season you can opt for long or short sleeves and according to the occasion you can settle for a suit thats richly encrusted with jewels or for a plain, casual suit for everyday womenswear.
       </p>
       <p>
        Our range of anarkali shalwar suits are popular with women who want to wear something formal, feminine and modest and again we offer a full range of colours and fabrics. Comprising a long length umbrella shaped dress, anarkali suits are comfortable and practical or for the woman who wants to make a statement, we offer a range that is rich in embellishment, making them suitable for occasionwear with a regal theme.
        <br/>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
